title: [Health] Coming out as bisexual was associated with increased risk of initiating cigarette smoking and current smoking in youth and young adults. The study represents one of the first analyses to explore the nuances of sexual identity development and timing associated with cigarette smoking initiation.
[Health] Cutaneous Bacteria in the Gut Microbiome as Biomarkers of Systemic Malodor and People Are Allergic to Me (PATM) Conditions: Insights From a Virtually Conducted Clinical Trial
